CustomField.description: A description of the selected Charge - Saurabh 16/11/21
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A description of the selected Charge
CustomField.label: What is this charge?

value.fullName: Usually for charging a mobile device and can have a comms link to payment device (ie – Bluetooth or Ethernet Base to Connect PAX A920 for fixed device option)
value.label: Usually for charging a mobile device and can have a comms link to payment device (ie – Bluetooth or Ethernet Base to Connect PAX A920 for fixed device option)

value.fullName: Either Remote or On-Site Installations. Usually half days charged for remote and full days for on-site
value.label: Either Remote or On-Site Installations. Usually half days charged for remote and full days for on-site

value.fullName: Charged as a fee for the solution being linked to or being able to link to a desired POS or PMS
value.label: Charged as a fee for the solution being linked to or being able to link to a desired POS or PMS

value.fullName: Set Up of MIDs, TIDs & Planet Portal Set Up
value.label: Set Up of MIDs, TIDs & Planet Portal Set Up

value.fullName: Can be used for Pay by link, i-Pay, and Straight W2P Website/Booking Engine set ups
value.label: Can be used for Pay by link, i-Pay, and Straight W2P Website/Booking Engine set ups

value.fullName: Set up of the merchants token account and service
value.label: Set up of the merchants token account and service

value.fullName: Gateway processing paid per terminal/PED and equated through review of actual transaction volumes to come to a mean average cost per terminal
value.label: Gateway processing paid per terminal/PED and equated through review of actual transaction volumes to come to a mean average cost per terminal

value.fullName: Hardware rental fee applied usually over a minimum of 36 months
value.label: Hardware rental fee applied usually over a minimum of 36 months

value.fullName: This is next day swap services and hardware replacement for terminal breakages
value.label: This is next day swap services and hardware replacement for terminal breakages

value.fullName: Incentive to switch on payment contract (excluding integration), should be filled in negative
value.label: Incentive to switch on payment contract (excluding integration), should be filled in negative

value.fullName: Monthly Recurring Gateway Fee, which can also include other monthly hosting fees for the campaign
value.label: Monthly Recurring Gateway Fee, which can also include other monthly hosting fees for the campaign

value.fullName: Data Trans Payment Gateway Once Off Fees
value.label: Data Trans Payment Gateway Once Off Fees

valueSettings.valueName: Monthly Recurring Gateway Fee, which can also include other monthly hosting fees for the campaign
Data Trans Payment Gateway Once Off Fees

valueSettings.controllingFieldValue: Service & Support Recurring Fee Per Location

valueSettings.valueName: Charged as a fee for the solution being linked to or being able to link to a desired POS or PMS

valueSettings.controllingFieldValue: Location Set Up Fee Per Location
valueSettings.valueName: Set Up of MIDs, TIDs & Planet Portal Set Up

valueSettings.controllingFieldValue: Web2Pay Set Up Fee Per MID
valueSettings.valueName: Can be used for Pay by link, i-Pay, and Straight W2P Website/Booking Engine set ups

valueSettings.controllingFieldValue: Token Set Up Fee Per Merchant
valueSettings.valueName: Set up of the merchants token account and service
Incentive to switch on payment contract (excluding integration), should be filled in negative
